code: import React from'react';import'./TabNav.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TabNav=_ref=>{let{activeTab,category,manufacturer,series,model,categoryName,manufacturerName,seriesName,modelName,handleTabClick}=_ref;const getTabClassName=tab=>{return"tab-item ".concat(activeTab===tab?'active':''," ").concat(!isTabEnabled(tab)?'disabled':'');};const isTabEnabled=tab=>{if(tab==='manufacturer')return!!category;if(tab==='series')return!!manufacturer;if(tab==='model')return!!series;if(tab==='alternative')return!!model;return true;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tab-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:getTabClassName('category'),onClick:()=>handleTabClick('category'),children:["Category ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tab-subtitle",children:categoryName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:getTabClassName('manufacturer'),onClick:()=>handleTabClick('manufacturer'),children:["Manufacturer ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tab-subtitle",children:manufacturerName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:getTabClassName('series'),onClick:()=>handleTabClick('series'),children:["Series ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tab-subtitle",children:seriesName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:getTabClassName('model'),onClick:()=>handleTabClick('model'),children:["Model ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tab-subtitle",children:modelName})]})]});};export default TabNav;
